snippet.title: Penetrator - ZX Spectrum Gameplay (Steam Re-Release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1982, Penetrator was a classic side-scrolling shoot-em-up for the ZX Spectrum, praised at the time for its impressive scrolling graphics on the home computer, despite its resemblance to Konami's Scramble. The game also included a level editor, a novelty at the time.

Developed by Beam Software
Published by The Melbourne House
Footage from the Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK
Also available on Commodore 64 and TRS-80

#zxspectrum #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #melbournehouse #themelbournehouse #beamsoftware #penetrator #sinclairzxspectrum
